" This application shows the shadow generated by the sun on a given object, for a particular day and time.
Usage: - Move the slider to change the time - Touch the screen to change view: 3D, Pause, Compass, Not rotated - Touch the screen and move to change model size - Menu for more options
Warning!! The accuracy of the phone's compass can be affected by the surrounding metal. If the compass is not working correctly or it is very unstable, you can do a manual orientation: - Select the current time and day (option menu \"Now\") - Touch the screen to pause rotations - Move the phone until the shadow you see in reality has the same direction as the shadow on the screen - Move the slider to see the shadow’s evolution during the day
